title: Understanding Purity Analysis
text: To verify the purity of a substance, you need to determine its composition and identify any impurities present. This often involves using specific analytical techniques.

title: Types of Analytical Techniques
text: There are several types of analytical techniques, including qualitative, quantitative, and characterization methods. Each serves a different purpose in analysis.

title: Characterization Techniques
text: Characterization techniques are used to determine the physical and chemical properties of a material, which is essential for verifying purity.

title: Choosing the Right Analysis Type
text: Which analysis type is used to verify the purity of gold jewelry?
